title: “I am the ‘onliest’ one who can go, and I’m scared."
post: The ‘A Profile in Courage’ was re-educational.  Thank You.  We still have a way to go in ‘The Rights’.
author: ekmcmahon

title: “I am the ‘onliest’ one who can go, and I’m scared."
post: Thanks to Dan for remembering our dear friend Fr. Kim Dreisbach. You might also wish to read the memorial we published on shroud.com after his passing. Here is the link: http://www.shroud.com/late06.htm#kim
author: Barrie Schwortz
